attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The whole of Wales and everybody in the boxing world agree that Joe Calzaghe should be given some recognition for his achievments in his battle to become the worlds greatest fighter. Please honour this man!!!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
